Amel Bouchoucha nke a makwaara dị ka Amal Bouchoucha (amụrụ na 24 Julaị 1982) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ Bouchoucha na Oran.
N'afọ 2015, Bouchoucha lụrụ onye ọchụnta ego Lebanọn bụ Waleed Awada, onye si Nabatieh. Ọ mụrụ nwa ya nwanyị Lea na 2017.
Amal malitere ịpụta mgbe ọ sonyere na oge nke ise nke Star Academy Arab World, na-anọchite anya obodo ya Algeria
N'oge ọ nọ na ihe ngosi ahụ, iwu ewu Amal na ndị na-akwado ya toro ngwa ngwa nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama maka olu ya siri ike yana ọnụnọ ya pụrụ iche na nke dị egwu.
N'oge ọ nọ na Star Academy, ihe ndị ọ na-agụ bụ abụ Arabic na French.
A họpụtara Amal ugboro atọ n'oge oge ahụ, nke mbụ bụ na 8th Prime nke ihe ngosi ahụ megide onye na-asọmpi Palestine Zaher Saleh na onye Morocco na-asọmpi ahụ, Asma Bassite
N'oge a na-ahọpụta ya, ọ rụrụ ihe a ma ama site na Najwa Karam nke a na-akpọ "Shou Hal Hala"
Ka e mesịrị n'otu oge ahụ, ya na onye asọmpi Ijipt Mirhan Hussein na onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Haifa Wehbe ga-ekere òkè n'ọkwa ahụ na mkpuchi nke egwu Warda Al-Jazairia "Ana Andi Baghbagan"
Amal mechara bụrụ abụ "Nadini" nke Myriam Fares
Na ngwụcha nke onye isi ala, Amal meriri ọtụtụ vootu ọha na eze nke ọ zọpụtara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ ọzọ n'izu.
Nhọpụta nke abụọ ya na oge nke iri na abụọ nke ihe ngosi ahụ mere ka ọ megide onye Morocco na-asọmpi Diaa Taybi na onye Tunisia na-azọ ọkwa, Amal Mahalaoui
Na ngwụcha nke oge kachasị mma, ọha na eze zọpụtara ya ọzọ.

Nhọpụta nke atọ ya na nke iri na atọ nke ihe ngosi ahụ mere ka e wepụ ya n'asọmpi ahụ dị ka onye Morocco a họpụtara, Diaa, onye a na-emegide ya na nke gara aga meriri ọtụtụ vootu ọha na eze nke hapụrụ ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ ịhọrọ n'etiti ya na onye Palestine na-asọmpi Zaher
Ọtụtụ n'ime vootu ụmụ akwụkwọ gara Zaher

Ọ bụ ezie na e wepụrụ ya, Amal ka jisiri ike mee akara ya site n'inye ihe dị egwu n'oge mbụ site n'ịrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ onye Egypt-Canada na-agụ egwú bụ Chantal Chamandy na mkpuchi nke Dalida "Helwa Ya Baladi".

Oge ndị ọzọ dị ịrịba ama a ga-ekwu maka ya bụ ọtụtụ ihe osise ya nke ọ rụrụ dị ka onye otu Academy's Angels, mmadụ atọ mejupụtara onwe ya, Mirhan Hussein na Amal Mahalaoui nke bụ ihe ngosi ahụ na Charlie's Angals.

N'oge ihe ngosi ikpeazụ nke hụrụ mmeri nke onye Tunisia Nader Guirat dị ka onye mmeri Maghrebi nke ihe ngosi ahụ, Amal putakwara n'ọgbọ ọzọ site n'ịrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ onye ọbịa mba ụwa Tina Arena na-eme mkpuchi nke egwu ya "Aimee Jusqu L'Impossible" yana n'akụkụ enyi ya Academy Angel Mirhan Hussein na mkpuchi nke abụ Sherine Abdel Wahab "Ana Sabry Aleel"
Ka oge na-aga, ya na ndị asọmpi ibe ya sonyeere n'ọkwa n'oge ikpeazụ n'asọpụrụ onye Ijipt Icon Abdel Halim Hafez site n'ịrụ egwu ya "Wehyat Albi Wefraho".
Afọ abụọ mgbe Star Academy Tenure gasịrị, Amal wepụtara otu "Batal El Alam Arabi" nke bụ otu mkpọsa na-egosi nkwado maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Algeria n'oge 2010 World Cup.
